tool_description: Twitter (X) Media Download, Profile, Twitter public and private data API.
name: Twitter (X) Media Download
title: Twitter (X) Media Download

api_list.name: Media Detail Private 18+
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitter-x-media-download.p.rapidapi.com/media/private"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitter-x-media-download.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
